def jsonRes = messageExchange.getResponse().contentAsString
def jsonSlurper = new groovy.json.JsonSlurper(); def parse = jsonSlurper.parseText(jsonRes)
def agencyId = parse.agency.agencyId log.info agencyId assert agencyId!=null
def agencyDetail = parse.agency.agencyDetail log.info agencyDetail assert agencyDetail!=null
